Instruction.FONT: Drag the correct answers to each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Neither of my two climbing friends succeeded in their attempt to climb Mount Everest. It was simply too cold past a certain level.
2. Very few women have sailed across the Atlantic on their own.
3. Several garden gates in our street were blown off by the gale force winds last night.
4. Both Ronaldinho and Thierry Henry are superb footballers and also excellent sportsmen.
5. My aunt is going to see another doctor for a second opinion about her back problems.
6. Can either of you make the weekend of June 25th to spend the weekend in Brighton?
7. ‘Can you hurry up please? I have very little time to spare.’
8. There are only a few hotels in Amsterdam with vacancies during December.
9. Each of the students was given a dictionary to complete the exercise.
10. The queue for concert tickets was so long that there weren’t many left by the time we got to the front of the queue.
